author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Always have a plan B for your plans 

Very important 

#PlanB 
#business

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Make plans for you life 

Or

Life will plan for you

Choose your choice

#planning

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
If you don't plan, you're preparing to fail

Start today, don't procrastinate.

Achieve that goal Tolani

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Grow more 

Or

Stay stagnant

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text: Your success as a brand depends on how you relate to your clients

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You no get money, you wan do big event.

No do pass yourself, Tolani.

#finance
#ChiefLiar
#FinancialLiteracyMonth 
#business

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Learn to understand your clients.

Don't just see things from your side alone, see it from your clients perspective. 

That could help you understand your clients better and give the best to them.

#event
#business 
#peoplemanagement

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Most times, customers are not always right

But it's best to respect them and speak to them calmly.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text: In business, anybody can insult you but you must still be nice to them.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You want people to be talking about your wedding as one of the best Weddings in Lagos 

And you want to collect 500k 

Please go ask those people with best Weddings how much they pay?

Go for what you can afford, don't compare yourself with others.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
While trying to take action on what you plan, please dont overthink or overanalyse.

Dont expect people to support you because you know them. 
Dont compare your journey to others.
You can be disappointed.

Know that and know peace.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Emotions can be controlled

You will struggle with it but be determined to control it 

Don't let it control you

You're in power.

#EidMubarak 
#Emotions

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You want to sell better than your competitors but you are always having a good swing.

Tolani, you can't keep customers.
Throw your mood swing in the bin and learn to manage people.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
To be emotionally intelligent, you must know what can get you angry or upset you.

Know your personalities,  Work on your weaknesses.

That's how you will learn how to manage each client that comes your way.

#business 
#peoplemanagement

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
It's your responsibility to grow, not the society.

Stop blaming Nigeria government for everything.
 
Plan yourself Tolani.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
It is often hard to teach people on how to manage their emotions.

You allow your emotions control you.
Just because you have a right to how you feel doesn't mean all you feel is right. 

#emotions
#emotionalmanagement

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You are good at your skill doesn't mean you should talk your clients anyhow, thinking they will always come back.

If you don't manage your clients, you will lose them to your  competitors.

#business 
#peoplemanagement

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You have to prepare your mind ahead before starting a business.

Be ready for hardwork
Be ready to do extra 
Be ready to stay focus.

Plan ahead, Tolani.
Dont say someone is doing better when you can do extra.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Not everyone is your friend, but be at peace with everyone.

Thats how to be a people-person.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
I know its hard to ignore people who are troublesome but you can decide to choose peace.

Your emotions can be control by you, not your emotions controlling you.

Avoid anger and choose love.
Ignore trouble and choose peace.
Choose YOU above all.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
The more you know people and interact, the more you can manage your emotions.

You cant manage your emotions when you refused to interact.
 
Tolani, speak out. Dont allow your mouth to smell.

Make friends, Be the life of an event.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Growth is literally attached to planning.

If you fail to plan, your growth will be stagnant.

Know this and Implement

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Planning is the process of thinking ahead, writing your goals down and making move in achieving that goal.

Planning starts when you can imagine the future with your goals in it.
It is very important as a person to always plan ahead.

#planning #Growth

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
How you manage your emotion shows how much you can deal with different types of people.

Controlling your anger is very important as people will always piss you off.
Rather, just keep quiet and let go.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Consistency has a lot to do with planning, you can decide to start or postpone.

Its your choice.
Dont be jealous of someone who has taken plan ahead, taking risks and now enjoying his/her life.

He/She was consistent with his/her plans.

Start now.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
The reason why Starr exists was because plans were made and work towards.

Watch out for more information on people management, emotions and planning.

#starr #events #growthdrive 
#EmotionalIntelligence

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You want to show you can do it all

Work does not finish, my sister.

Better don't kill yourself.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text: When you have money, the confidence will come to talk anywhere

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Ideas without finances will make you seems stagnant

Break the yoke

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text: You're your own limitations

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text: Reason some people wont be successful is because they refused to grow

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
If you're too big for instructions

You're too small to receive the blessings🔥🔥🔥

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Speak positive words to yourself everyday

That's how to grow.
Believing in yourself everyday that you can do it and you're getting there.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Work on your character.

Don't expect people to accept you for who you are, when you can be a better person.

Cultivate a good character.
Work on yourself.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You become like what you read

Read the books that will help you grow.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Boss raped his workers and threatened her.

God will have many things to judge.

What will sorry do after the hurt?

#HorribleBosses

https://t.co/Gdl71PM5jv

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
How will change someone offer from product manager to product intern after the first month, saying its a mistake, reducing his pay?

Whats wrong with some companies? VPD money

#HorribleBosses

https://t.co/Gdl71PM5jv

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Always good to move around with a pen and a book or probably your phone notes.

Don't trust your brain to remember any idea that drops in your head anytime.

Write your ideas down.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
The reason why you don't know if you are growing is because you're not going back to do a review 

Do a review of the past and current to know how far you still need to work.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Every good thing is from God.

If it was bad at some point, it was never good from the first place.

Pray scripturally.

Are you a saint or mere church goer?

We can be active not serving God.
Work on yourself so as to grow.
Sow up yourself in righteousness

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
God wants intimacy but He wants a balance.
In the place of intimacy, we must not be over familiar.
God exercises loving kindness.

The devil is always seeking to cut us off from God.

God loves you is enough to push you always to Him.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Godly character is not same as morals.

Attending all church programmes is not same.

Understanding brings the fear of God.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
The keeper wont do anything until we ask for help.

Taking God responsibilities and not understanding our own responsibility affect our growth.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
God emphasis is still understanding.

If you don't understand that you need to plant to reap something, then you dont understand.

To start with is to know that The seed is the WORD.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
I wont stop for myself.
I wont stop for others.

I will be a watchman

#growthmindset

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
You're strong

You're special

You're beautiful

You're intelligent

You're ambitious

You're a winner

That's why you're a woman

Happy International women day to you all.🥰❤❤❤

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
Yesterday I was coming from work.
I was about crossing the road at ojota, I saw a woman holding a young child and carrying a few months old baby on her shoulder.

I was so worried that how will she cross the roads with her babies,on the busy roads of Lagos.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text: You can always start all over again.

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text: I realised if you don't take out of your busy schedule to develop or grow, you will be left behind

author: Event Planning | Starr 🤩😍❤
text:
What papa said sometimes ago:

Stop being quiet.

You have been quiet enough.

Give Value.
